statements: DELETE FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE from_address = '0x1234567890abcdef' AND to_address = '0x9876543210fedcba';
DELETE FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123 AND action = 'update';
DELETE FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123 AND action = 'approve';
DELETE FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM transaction_comments WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND comment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM block_transactions WHERE block_id = 100 AND transaction_id = 50;
DELETE FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'withdraw' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
